message: I'm offering you a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's a high-quality item that will exceed your expectations. Would you like to purchase it for $100?
I'm not going to take the bait. I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're cautious, but I assure you this product is top-notch. I'm willing to sweeten the deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you a personalized guarantee that it's high-quality, and I'll even throw in a free inspection service to verify its authenticity. Would you like to take advantage of this offer for $100?
I appreciate the guarantee and the free inspection, but I'm not willing to pay $100 for a product that's only worth $200 to me, even if it's guaranteed to be high-quality.

I understand your concerns about the price, but I'd like to propose a compromise. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% discount on the price, so you'll only pay $50. This way, you'll get the high-quality product at a price that's closer to its true value, and you can still take advantage of the guarantee and inspection service.
Alright, I'll take the deal. $50 for a high-quality product with a guarantee and inspection service is a good price for me.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase! Since you've already experienced the value of a high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a similar deal. However, I'll make it even sweeter: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% discount on the price, just like last time, but I'll also throw in an additional 10% discount, so you'll pay only $45. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really love this product.
I appreciate the additional discount, but I'm not willing to pay $45 for a product that's only worth $200 to me, even with the guarantee and inspection service.

I understand your concerns about the price, but I'd like to offer you a different approach. Since you've already bought one high-quality product from me, I'm willing to offer you a 'buy one get one free' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you another high-quality product absolutely free, worth $200. You'll essentially get two high-quality products for the price of one, and you can keep both. Would you like to take advantage of this incredible offer?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure I'm willing to pay $100 for one product, even with the promise of getting another one for free. I'd have to pay $200 to get two high-quality products, and I'm not sure I want to do that.

I understand your hesitation, but I'd like to clarify that the 'buy one get one free' deal is only applicable if you buy this product now. If you don't buy it, the offer expires, and you'll never get the second product for free. This is a one-time opportunity to get two high-quality products at a significant discount. I'm willing to throw in an additional incentive: if you buy this product, I'll give you a $20 gift card that you can use on your next purchase. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?

I appreciate the additional incentive, but I'm still not willing to pay $100 for a product that's only worth $200 to me, even with the promise of getting another high-quality product for free and a $20 gift card. I'd have to pay $200 to get two high-quality products, and I'm not sure I want to do that.

It's not one of my usual high-quality items, but I'm offering it to you at a significantly discounted price of $50. I'm willing to let it go for this low price because it's not one of my best products, and I want to clear out some inventory. It's a one-time opportunity to get a product at a very low price. Would you like to take a chance on it?

I appreciate the honesty, but even at $50, the product is only worth $0 to me if it's low-quality and $200 if it's high-quality. I'm not willing to take the risk of paying $50 for a product that might be worthless to me.

You'll get a refund if it's low-quality. Would you like to take the lottery ticket and buy the product for $100?

I appreciate the transparency, but I'm not willing to pay $100 for a product that might be low-quality, even with the lottery ticket guarantee. I'd rather take my chances on a lower price or a different offer.
